Layer.name: srtm_10
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select geom,height::integer from contours WHERE height::integer % 10 = 0 AND height::integer % 50 != 0 AND height::integer % 100 != 0) as "contours-10"

Layer.name: srtm_50
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select geom,height::integer from contours WHERE height::integer % 50 = 0 AND height::integer % 100 != 0) as "contours-50"

Layer.name: srtm_100
Layer.Datasource: &postgis-settings; (select geom,height::integer from contours WHERE height::integer % 100 = 0) as "contours-100"
